markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Batsbreath Cane](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2155)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Sonic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=147" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 105 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 950 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Probing Cane](/Weapons.aspx?ID=229)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A specialized _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [thundering](/Equipment.aspx?ID=306) [probing cane](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1346)_ made from strengthened spruce wood, a _batsbreath cane_ is distinctive for its brass tip. The tip covers a small hollow in the wood that houses quartz crystals infused with latent storm magic.

<document level="2" id="action-1656" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Batsbreath Cane
